manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 6 Inch Size The small 6-inch fan fits on most desks and nightstands. Its mini size also makes it travel-friendly. Take it on your camping trip to keep your tent cool. Fight the hot and humid weather with this super quiet fan! 2 In 1 Desk And Clip On Our fan comes with a removable base and cli-on. Use the clip-on to attach the fan to desk. The 2-in1 desk and clip-on modes help you use the fan in any way. Keep yourself comfortable with our desk fan! Customized omfort The portable desk fan features two speed settings. Use the adjustable tilt to adjust the angle of the airflow. The fan stays silent and does not disturb you while working. Stay cool and productive all day long. Many Applications This convenient desk fan has many applications. It is perfect for growing tents and camping tents. Place it on your nightstand or office desk to stay comfortable all day. Keep yourself cool wherever you go!
Black Fan Black Fan - 2 Pack White Fan White Fan - 2 Pack Color Black Black White White Quantity 1 2 1 2 Desk Fan ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Clip On Fan ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

Ram Pro Clip-On Fan The Problem: You have a work desk where the air of the ceiling fan does not reach you. It becomes very uncomfortable when the weather is hot and humid thereby making it even more difficult as well as uncomfortable for you. You have a mini fan with you at your home but the quality of the blades and the fan as a whole is not at all good which is why you are hesitating to use it at the times of your need. Moreover, the speed of the fan is not so good which makes the product unsuitable for use. Our Solution: Our clip-on fan is just the perfect thing which you need for the purpose of making it comfortable for you with some air in a hot and humid weather. With the help of the fan, you can get air at any place you want without facing any kinds of problems. The blades of the mini clip fan are of a very good quality and is extremely durable in nature. This is the reason as to why you can use the fan without any kind of hesitation. Moreover, the perfect dimensions of the product make it perfectly suitable and convenient to use. 6 Inch Size The mini clip fan with blades is of 6 inch in size. The ideal size of makes the product perfect for its intended purpose of use. Possesses a Clip In an addition to this, the presence of the clip allows the fan to very easily clip on to any surfaces with a strong clamp. Durable in Nature The mini fan with clip has a strong and sturdy construction. The clip-on fan comes with tough and break resistant ABS plastic blades. Adjustable Tilt The mini clip fan has an adjustable clip for appropriately aiming the flow of air. The fan a good speed with a whisper quiet operation. Applications are Great The clip fan is readily used for the purpose of getting some air on the desks, worktops and a number of other places as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described and works great! The dual mount is perfect for travel.
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as described and works great! The dual mount is perfect for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Good Personal Portable Fan
reviews.reviewText: This 6" fan does the trick to keep us cool, clear across a queen size bed with a comfortable slight breeze.Quiet & draws very little power. Good even for office or travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far, this is a nice little fan.
reviews.reviewText: I like this nice little fan for my devices. I clipped it on the little table with my tv and streaming device. With just a little noise, it has allowed me to use my devices for 8 hours without the devices overheating in a town that has temperatures of 90 to 106 degrees outside and one other fan pointed toward me. My devices stayed cool and the little black fan did not overheat. I have not used the stand, just the clip.So far, I'm pleased with this purchase. It is worth it to save your electronics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For my son at college
reviews.reviewText: AMAZING! Dorm is hot. He clamped it to the base of the bunk - SOOOOOOO grateful! Well worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Used it for a bathroom that had no airflow and works wonders. I just clipped it underneath a shelf and it's good to go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars soft plastic fan
reviews.reviewText: The fan it self is made with soft plastic, is very easy to bent. the base is not heavy enough, it can be tip over easy. Clamping on is ok, but direction adjust is very limit. Noise level is ok but not too strong in high mode. Over all too cheap...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what we always wanted

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Packs a lot of power for a it's size. I have had this more than a year now and it's still working. I really didn't expect it to last this long but I am pleasantly surprised.

reviews.reviewTitle: VALUE, PRICE AND IF IN STOCK
reviews.reviewText: IT WAS THE PERFECT SIZE AND IT CAN BE STANDING ON THE FLOOR OR CLIPPED TO SOMETHING

reviews.reviewTitle: Stopped working, has no battery to replace
Do not buy, clamps are cheap and break right away.
reviews.reviewText: It plugs in so why it asks for battery life is beyond me. It’s garbage. I bought 2 and in 2 days both the clamps had broken. Kids never even got to use them cause I attached them to the top of their bunks in the afternoon and by bed time they were on the ground from the clamps snapping. Zero stars, giant waste of money.
It has a strong clamp. Very quiet. Two speeds.Very weak air flow. You would need to have this about a foot away from you for it to make any difference.

Firstly, the clamp is too large to securely stay on a vertical pole. Mine kept sliding down. Secondly, it has zero air flow. You can barely feel the air against the back of your hand. Very disappointed. I had to replace this unit within a week due to poor performance.
